column1: fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards covers
fuller again, around off and sliding in, Rahane comes forward and looks to defend, fails to middle as the ball rolls towards short fine leg
fuller on the stumps, driven back towards the bowler
fuller around off, slog-sweeps it over midwicket, a boundary to get off the mark
length ball on middle and leg, looks to flick but misses and is struck on the pads
length ball on middle and leg, tucked away behind square leg for a single
and he strikes first-ball. Trapped in front and up goes the finger. Was a length ball, keeps coming in with the angle, Rahane moves across and looks to flick, misses and is struck near the knee-roll
back of length outside off, stays back and punches it towards covers
short of length outside off once again, looks to punch off the back foot but fails to middle
slower length ball around off, waits for it before turning it towards square leg
back of length outside off, gets on his toes and defends on the off side
a touch fuller outside off this time, mistimes the punch towards extra cover
fuller around off, driven towards short midwicket where Uthappa misfields, he is not wearing mask anymore
a googly but the line is wrong, on middle and leg and whipped behind square for four
fuller around off and middle, comes forward and pushes it towards extra cover
another wrong'un, this one around off, Buttler goes back and punches it on the off side, cannot beat the cover fielder
flatter around middle this time, Buttler goes back and defends
another googly, Buttler was looking to give himself some room, ends up chopping it into the ground, the ball hits the keeper's pad and rolls towards short fine leg
length ball outside off, stands in his crease and punches it towards mid-off, not the best of the timings
slower length ball around off, clips it past short midwicket on his right for four
length ball outside off, was looking to back away but then moves across to scoop it over short fine leg, one-bounce four
fuller around off and drilled towards the right of mid-off, Kuldeep does well to make a partial stop and keeps it to one
length around off, stays back and brings his wrists into play to flick it towards deep square leg
back of length outside off, looks to punch it through covers, the ball hits the inner half and rolls towards mid-on
fuller around off, comes forward and slaps it towards cover, not quite timed
fuller around off and middle this time, drives it on the front foot, to extra cover this time
use of feet by Buttler to this length ball on the stumps, pushed towards mid-on
length ball around off, stays back and punches it towards the right of short midwicket
flatter and quicker on the stumps, 119kph, Buttler goes back and taps it towards short midwicket
flatter and quicker again, Buttler goes back to pull but was late on the shot, misses and is hit on the pads
length around off, slower in pace, Smith waits and steers it towards backward point, 85kph
length around off, Smith comes forward and turns it towards square leg
fuller, almost in the blockhole on off and middle, digs it out towards extra cover
length ball on middle, pushed towards the right of long-on from the back foot, Smith was quick to turn back for the second
length on middle and leg, looks to flick towards midwicket but mistimes it towards square leg
length ball on middle and leg again, goes for the flick but straight to square leg once more
length ball around off, comes forward and turns it towards short midwicket
scooped this time, length ball around off, goes down on one knee and collects a couple
short of length around off and middle, Smith goes back and pulls but fails to take advantage, one-bounce to deep midwicket,
fuller outside off this time, dragged towards long-on as the ball spins on the batsman
a wrong'un this time, length ball around off, goes back and flicks it towards wide long-on, comes back for the second
fuller on the stumps, looks to drive straight but it hits the outer half and rolls towards long-off
length around off, comes forward and pushes it towards short midwicket
fuller on the stumps, drives inside out, beats extra cover but there is protection in deep
short of length and spinning back, Smith was looking to give himself some room but is cramped, chopped towards extra cover
gets it past backward point this time, short of length and that little of room outside off, Smith bisects the gap between backward point and short third man
a touch fuller on middle and leg, looks to sweep but misses, gets a leg-bye as the ball rolls behind square

length ball, pitching on middle and leg and going down, Buttler was on the back foot, looks to flick but misses. There is an appeal for lbw but I think it was missing leg. DK and Narine having a chat but they have run out of the time
fuller on middle and leg, goes for the reverse sweep and hits it over backward point for four
use of feet to take it on the full, drives but cannot beat the cover fielder
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it past the cover fielder
swept and swept hard, rolling his wrists over to find the deep square leg boundary
length ball on the stumps, goes back and flicks, finds short midwicket
fuller around off and middle, driven inside out towards long-off
slower length ball outside off, slips in his followthrough but beats Smith with the lack of pace who was looking to work it on the leg side
length ball on the stumps, turned away behind square for one
another slower one, fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-off from the crease, that single brings up the fifty stand between these two
another cutter, fuller outside off and leaving the batsman, Smith was down on one knee and looking to sweep it away, misses
length outside off, stays back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
length ball around off, punched towards extra cover off the back foot
leading edge as he closes the face and withdraws at this wrong'u going across him. Lifts up at him and dribbles past short third
length outside off, punched to long-on off the back foot
reverse slap past backward point. Good option on a slow pitch. Kuldeep pushes one through quick and he quickly gets in position to get this away
tossed up outside off, gets more of this with a reverse sweep, but he finds point this time
length outside off, mistimed reverse sweep rolls to short third off the inside half of the bat
googly at a length on off stump, closes the face and pokes this into the leg side
straight to deep square on the bounce. Slower ball dropped short at middle stump and he pulls firmly after getting on the back foot
slower ball at a length on off stump, looks for the reverse sweep again. It ends up at mid-off, whose throw gives them a run at deep square
length at leg stump, punched into the leg side off the back foot
slower ball at a length, wide outside off and left alone
clears deep square! That took some power. Slower ball, short and in at the body. Tough to hit these shots off the back foot on this surface, but Buttler puts everything into this pull

finds deep midwicket this time! Not easy to hit sixes! Another slower ball, dipping at a length on off stump. Lines it up and keeps his shape as he slugs across the line, but Gill is there, inches from the boundary, to take this calmly
slower ball at a length on leg stump, clipped to deep midwicket
length at middle stump, gets deep in the crease and pokes this to midwicket
length at middle stump, steps out and flicks uppishly to deep square's left
leading edge onto the body and to short third's left as he looks to paddle this. Half an lbw appeal from DK, turned down
full on off stump, driven with the turn to long-off
short of a length just outside off, backs away and cuts to sweeper's left
length and straightening from a middle stump line. Shapes to flick but drops it respectfully into the leg side
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length ball, offbreak, pitching outside leg and spinning further down. Left alone

length on middle stump, gets forward for the flick and misses. Cops it on the pad, runs and survives the run-out chance at the other end as DK misses with the throw. They decide not to review the lbw, probably going down
length at the stumps, nudged to deep midwicket
short of a length and turning in rapidly from off stump. He sets up to punch into the off side but cops this on the thigh guard. Deflected into the short third region
length at leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length at leg stump, paddled to short fine's right
starts with the slower ball. Short of a length and wide outside off. Chucks his hands at it and this skids on from underneath
full on leg stump, stays deep in the crease and flicks to deep midwicket
length outisde off, punched on the rise to sweeper

offcutter, short and wide outside off. Cut to third man's right. Narine is the third man. That means no dive after the sprint to the right and the bowler gets two extra runs that may not have happened otherwise
slower ball at a length on middle stump, gets forward and flicks to long-on's right
slower ball down leg side, waits on it and swats it to the long leg boundary! Gratefully accepts the extra pace on the ball and jumps from 39 to 50. Top innings from Smith
slower ball at a length down leg side, steps out and gets a leading edge towards deep square as he looks to pull
slower short ball wide outside off, laboured cut out to sweeper cover
raps his pad with a regular paced full ball. It's pitched outside leg. Tripathi cross with himself after missing on the flick

taken by Chawla jogging in from mid-off! God, this Gurney's a menace, isn't he? Yet another slower ball. Lobbed up full outside off. Tripathi has the right idea - to go inside-out over extra - but that's difficult to execute on this pitch and against this bowler. Lifts it high and it's an easy catch
slower ball at a length on off stump. Gets on the back foot, dabs it into the point region
slower ball at off stump, leans in and pushes to midwicket
firmly swept, but straight to deep midwicket. Length outside off, plants a big stride out and nails this
full on off stump, gets to the pitch, pushes to extra cover's left and calls early
googly at a length on leg stump, gets on the back foot and punches to deep midwicket. Sends Stokes back as he hares down for a second
short of a length and turning away outside off, gets on the back foot and hammers this to long-off
length at off stump, pokes it into the covers
full on leg stump, reverse sweep straight to point
KKR have reviewed the lbw decision. Length on middle stump, shuffles and looks to sweep. Cops it on the thigh in front of middle. It's umpire's call. Smith survives a second time
length on middle stump, gets low and sweeps again. Misses again, cops it on the leg

massive! Oh boy, what a sweet hit! Length ball at middle stump, steps out and is not to the pitch but he brings the bat down from under the ball and gives it a full swing to send it way over midwicket
length at middle stump, gets low and looks to bludgeon this pull. Inside edge into the leg side
short of a length outside off, punched straight to extra cover
reverse sweep is hit well, but sweeper slides to his right and cuts this off. Picked from a length outside off and hit aerially
length ball wide outside off, backs away and chucks his hands at it to be beaten. Made too much room
no-ball. Should be front foot, because that full toss hit Stokes on the thigh. Yes, front foot. Stokes misses out with the slog

struck on the bicep. Superb bowling from Prasidh. Slower bouncer on middle stump. Too early on the hook and he falls to the floor after being struck. Scampers hurriedly to the other end as point lobs a throw back
outside edge flies past the keeper. Or takes is thumb as he sticks out the right hand. 148kph yorker outside off. Smith looks to slice, too late on it

beaten as he steps into the off side for the ramp. It's past off stump and an extremely harsh wide call from the umpire. That ball went through where Smith was in his stance. DK stops as they steal an extra
beamer this time and Stokes just manages to get bat on it as it flies at his mid-riff. Back down the pitch off the high part of the bat
low full toss outside off driven to sweeper's left. A sliding stop
past the hips, a slower short ball. He misses with the pull. This one probably a wide, but it's not given
length on middle stump, looks for the slog, mistimes it out to long-on
slower ball from around the wicket. Short of a length outside off. Steps out and mistimes a flat-batted swat towards long-off
slower ball at a length, wide outside off. Steps into the line and looks to blitz it over midwicket. Beaten
attempted yorker outside off. Steps out, meets it on the full, and pokes it to long-off's left
slower ball at a length on off stump, steps out and looks to drive. This rips away from the outside edge
squeezes it past short third. Gurney goes change-up, with a seam-up. It's yorker length across the corridor and he jams the bat down, opens the face and gets it between backward point and short third
yorker just outside off, opens the face again but hits this one straight to short third
length ball on the stumps, cramping Lynn for room who gets an inside edge on to the pads, an appeal for lbw but not out
short of length on the stumps once again, goes for the pull but gets an inside edge once more, just evades the stumps and runs towards the fine-leg boundary
slower length ball around off, comes forward and drops it towards point for one
back of length at the body, Narine pushes it towards long-on for one
short of length, some room outside off, Lynn stands tall and slaps it past the diving extra cover for four
slower length ball this time, 115.6kph, stands in his crease and chops it towards mid-off
length ball down the leg side, Narine swipes it behind square for four
length ball around off, pushes it towards mid-off
length ball on the stumps, clears his front leg and lofts it over wide long-on for a biggie
flatter and fuller on the pads, swings across and sends it towards deep square leg boundary for another four
length ball but line is again outside leg, goes down and sweeps it over short fine leg for four more
length outside off, stays back and forces it over extra cover to end the over with another four. Twenty-two off that over and KKR are off to a flyer
length ball around off, slower one from Jofra as well, looks to cut it away, gets an inside edge into the ground
almost 147kph, length in the channel, surprises Lynn with the pace who was stuck in the crease, looks to play it with the hands and misses
short of length outside off, cuts and cuts hard, not from the middle of the bat maybe but enough to beat deep backward point
length ball on the stumps, gets behind the line and pushes it towards short midwicket
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards short fine leg
slower length ball outside off, 124kph, pushes it towards extra cover

dropped by Rahul Tripathi. Slower length ball around off, Narine looks to go aerial towards long-off but ends up skying it towards backward point, Tripathi is coming under it, is under it but spills in the end

more luck for KKR! Length ball coming in at the batsman who is cramped for the room, gets an inside edge that hits the leg stump, the stumps light up but the bails don't dislodge, and to added to the misery, this has raced towards the fine leg boundary. Should have been runs, but the umpire signals byes
slower length ball on the stumps, Lynn comes forward and slaps it towards deep midwicket for four more
short of length outside off, punches it towards covers
another slower one, short of length again, pulled behind square, only a single this time
length ball on the pads, looks to flick but misses, an appeal for caught-behind by Buttler but looked like it just brushed the pads
short of length around off, Lynn skips down the track, stays leg side of the ball and flat-bats it over long-on for six
length around off and middle, Lynn once again looks to give himself some room, pushes it towards covers
length ball, cramping the batsman for room who dabs it towards short midwicket for a quick single
length ball on the pads, fails to put the bat on it but will collect a leg-bye
length ball around off and middle, pushed towards short midwicket
a bouncer to end the over with, short outside off, Lynn sways away from the line and lets it go through to the keeper
slower length ball, wide outside off, Narine looks to reach out for it but cannot connect
slower length ball but this one is closer to Narine who clears his front leg and swings it towards deep midwicket, one bouncer and over the rope
a low full toss on the stumps, Narine's method is simple, he swings across towards deep midwicket and collects two more
slower length ball this time, on middle and leg, takes the front leg out and clears the mid-on with ease, four more to Narine
a bouncer this time, Narine was once again looking to back away but it's too high and he let's it go, a wide
misses this time, slower length ball but way outside off, a swing and a miss
a touch fuller but once again wide outside off, swings across and gets it off the toe-end of the bat, rolls towards short third man
length ball at the pads, looks to whip it away, misses but will get a leg-bye
a googly from Shreyas, length around middle and off and leaves the batsman to beat the outside edge
length around off, Narine is unsure and in the end, pushes it towards covers
wrong'un again but too short, goes back and cuts it towards deep extra cover
flatter again, this time at the batsman who stays back and punches it back
short of length outside off, goes down and sweeps it towards deep square leg
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards wide long-off
length ball but down the leg side and spinning away
this one kept low, short of length outside leg and going with the angle to hit Narine near ankle, an appeal for lbw but not out, gets leg-byes
length ball on the pads, looks to play a pick-up shot but misses and is struck on the pads
a touch fuller this time, on the pads and Narine goes big, slog sweeps it over deep square leg
length ball on the stumps, a googly from Midhun, comes forward to defend and misses, struck on the front pad but would have missed off
length ball around off, goes down and tonks it over deep midwicket and it just keeps sailing, Narine reaches 47 off just 24
fuller around off, it's a googly and Lynn goes down and sweeps it over deep square leg for six more
length outside off and spinning away, sweeps it behind square leg for a single, was a top-edge but safe
length ball, a googly again, goes back to cut and gets an outside edge, Smith takes a sharp catch at first slip at chest height with the fingers pointing upwards
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards extra cover
a googly from outside off, pitching on a length, Uthappa goes back and defends
length ball on the stumps, goes back and flicks it towards square leg
fuller outside off, comes forward and drives it firmly past extra cover for four
length ball around middle and leg and spinning away, gets an outside edge that goes past first slip, the short third one chases to keep it to three
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts, gets an outside edge that runs past short third man for four
fuller around off, comes forward and drives back towards the bowler
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
short of length outside off, goes back and pulls it towards long-on
length outside off, leans in and drives to long-off
smokes it over midwicket! Googly at a length outside off, pushed through flat and clobbered with a slog sweep!
dropped? Yes, as the umpire doesn't signal byes. Length ball ripping way from off stump, looks to get into the drive but is late. Thick edge and Buttler grabs at it and misses. That is fifty for Lynn
length at middle stump, punched to deep midwicet

finds deep backward square. Just short of a good length, and therefore gets big on Lynn who is down for the sweep. He can't control as he scythes from under this and gets a top edge straight to Midhun
googly, short of a length on middle stump. Nudged to midwicket's right off the back foot
slower ball, full on leg stump. Leans in and flicks to deep square
length outside off, punched on the rise to mid-off
slower ball at a length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
full outside off, leans in and slices to third man's right
full on off stump, driven back to the bowler off the toe-end
low full toss on leg stump, flicked to fine leg
length outside off, drives on the up to long-off
short ball at middle stump, backs away and wallops this pull over the wide long-on boundary
full outside off, driven to long-off's left
length outside off, short-arm pull to long-on
glorious. Full ball, pushed through, again, quite quick. Plants the leg slightly inside the line and lofts it straight over the bowler like he's getting throwdowns
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
tickled fine. Length ball at leg stump, leans in for the flick, can't get bat on it. Gets just enough leg
length on middle stump, solidly defended to mid-on off the front foot
short ball down leg side, looks for the hook, mistimed towards fine leg
slower ball at a length on middle stump, gets deep in the crease and flicks to deep square
length outside off, a nice looking drive on the front foot, straight to extra cover
well he won't hit the winnings runs. Much like they have all innings, Royals hand it on a platter. A slower ball down leg side
